name: Vegan Gingerbread Muffins - Blender Triple Ginger Muffins
description: Soft Moist Triple Ginger Gingerbread Muffins with candied, fresh and ground ginger and gingerbread spices. This muffin batter can be made in a blender! Vegan Nut-free Soy-free Recipe Makes 12 muffins
recipeIngredient: 2/3 cup sugar (use 2 tbsp more for sweeter (preferably a combination of brown sugar and cane sugar))
a very good pinch each of ground cloves, allspice and nutmeg
3 tbsp or more chopped candied ginger

recipeInstructions.text: Line a muffin pan with liners. Preheat the oven to 365 degrees F / 180ºc.
recipeInstructions.name: Line a muffin pan with liners. Preheat the oven to 365 degrees F / 180ºc.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend all the wet ingredients in a blender till the sugar is well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend all the wet ingredients in a blender till the sugar is well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the dry ingredients in a bowl. Add candied ginger and toss to coat. Add the blended wet ingredients and mix to make a batter. Pour into lined muffin pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the dry ingredients in a bowl. Add candied ginger and toss to coat. Add the blended wet ingredients and mix to make a batter. Pour into lined muffin pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Alternatively, add the dry ingredients except candied ginger to the blender. Blend in pulses of 2 to 3 seconds until you get a smooth batter. Sprinkle the candied ginger with 1 tsp flour, then fold into the batter in the blender. Pour the batter into lined muffin pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Alternatively, add the dry ingredients except candied ginger to the blender. Blend in pulses of 2 to 3 seconds until you get a smooth batter. Sprinkle the candied ginger with 1 tsp flour, then fold into the batter in the blender. Pour the batter into lined muffin pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle some granulated sugar or crushed ginger snaps on top of the batter. Bake at 365 degrees F  / 180ºc for 18 to 20 minutes, or until toothpick from the center comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle some granulated sugar or crushed ginger snaps on top of the batter. Bake at 365 degrees F  / 180ºc for 18 to 20 minutes, or until toothpick from the center comes out clean.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool in the pan for 10 mins, then on the cooling rack. Store on the counter in a covered container for upto 3 days and refrigerate for longer. These muffins get tastier as they sit as the flavors get stronger. I like them best a day later.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool in the pan for 10 mins, then on the cooling rack. Store on the counter in a covered container for upto 3 days and refrigerate for longer. These muffins get tastier as they sit as the flavors get stronger. I like them best a day later.

keywords: blender gingerbread muffins, vegan gingerbread muffins, winter spiced muffins
